item.description:
The full course is broken up into ten individual classes.
While it is recommended to attend the classes in order, if you are not able to attend one or two of the classes, you can make them up at a later date and/or simply take individual classes when they call to you.
Each class is $30 and runs from 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM. Please register for each individually.
*Classes one through seven are required before attending classes eight through ten*

This class is called intensive for a reason and will challenge you! It will give you the tools and support you need in opening up to your life path and fully harnessing your intuition. Awareness of why you are here and how to get to where you really want to be are key aspects to this class as well as the main focus of developing psychically. Combining science and spirituality, pragmatic and alternative knowledge, this class will provide you with valuable knowledge that will help you to create an amazing and purposeful life! This class empowers you to take off the blinders to your current life, make decisions based on your inner knowledge, hone your natural psychic abilities to begin living in abundance and blissful spiritual flow. If you are wishing to open up intuitively and psychically this class will provide you with what you need to do just that!
I love teaching these classes. It’s an honor and it’s amazing to see the outstanding growth each student experiences! - Isabeau Esby

Class Location - Dover, New Hampshire - Directions will be given to you upon registration
**Space is very limited, pre-registration for each class is required, to register contact 603-973-2317 or email isabeauesby@me.com **

Class One - Spiritual Ethics and Protection - Wed, June 9th, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Two - Positivity vs. Negativity and Energy Awareness - Wed, June 16th, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Three - Opening Up, Taking Off the Blinders - Wed, June 23rd, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Four - Cleaning Up Your Life- Wed, June 30th, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Five - How the Otherside Works - Wed, July 7th, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Six - Manifestation and Ceremony - Wed, July 14th, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Seven - Communicating With Your Guides - Wed, July 21st, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Eight - Exploring Your Personal Intuitive Strength - Wed, July 28th, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Nine - Psychic Intuition and Mediumship - Wed, Aug 4th, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM
Class Ten - Fine Tuning Your Reading Techniques - Wed, Aug 11th, 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM

Testimonial from a previous student:
A person can find many workshops or multi-week programs offering life renewal or change. But rarely does a person have the opportunity to study with someone who can bring so much 'to the table'. How to explain the talents of Isabeau Esby. To the point, she is both out of this world and very much of this world. A person of enormous spiritual gifts, experience and education, she has be ability to connect a person to metaphysical energies that allude most human beings. She is a successful medium, after all; it is her job to bridge both worlds. Yet she is a grounded mother of two who fully lives in everyday America and understands the challenges in melding spiritual exploration and practices with the pressures and practical demands of our lives. As with all good teachers, she is both an excellent listener and communicator. And her classes are fun! - those who expect discussions on spirituality to be ponderous and dreary will be disappointed with Isabeau's classes. Her class has given me much to ponder and has allowed me to creatively explore the important life questions facing me now. Quite frankly, I can hardly wait to get to class. Every time I go, I have one of those 'aha' moments that we hear Oprah talk about. It is quite addicting! I believe anyone willing to make the time and the commitment will benefit greatly from Isabeau's class.

Webber
item.name: Spiritual Awakening and Psychic Development Intensive
